description:
This is one of the craziest times we’ve ever lived through. There is absolutely no doubt about that. I recently got an email from one of my mentors that really got me thinking more about all of this. There’s 2 reasons that people are panicking and if we’re a little more conscious about the 2nd one then we might be able to subside the fear monger. What are your thoughts? I’m very interested to hear everyone’s opinions. 
#fear #fearmongering #coronavirus #coronaviruspandemic #coronavirusoutbreak⚠️
